Key Match Events: Brendan Donovan hit a three-run homer, Nolan Arenado hit a tying RBI single, and Iv√°n Herrera hit an RBI double in the sixth and scored on a throwing error by Yankees catcher Austin Wells
Post-Match Reflections: Donovan said after the game that hitting a home run was a good day, and that the win was special for the organization
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cardinals improved to 1-7 at Yankee Stadium in the regular season
Helsley became the first Cardinal to record a save in the Bronx since Ron Taylor pitched the final four innings of Game 4 of the 1964 World Series
Others: Warren and catcher/infielder Ben Rice were optioned to Triple-A Scranton/Wilkes Barre after the game
RHP Clarke Schmidt (strained right lat) threw a side session and the team will decide by Sunday if he needs another rehab appearance or can be activated
